title: New Research Suggests A Unique Way To Enhance Your Sex Life

title: Viral Images Of Donald Trump Getting Arrested Are Totally Fake (For Now)
description: Have you seen photos of former president Donald Trump getting arrested? They’re fake. Or, at least they were at the time of this writing on Sunday afternoon. Images purporting to show Trump getting arrested have gone viral on social media platforms like Twitter.

title: Florida Bill Could Ban Elementary Schools From Talking About Menstrual Periods
description: When asked, Rep. Stan McClain (R), who sponsored House Bill 1069, admitted that his bill could prohibit girls from discussing their periods in elementary school.

title: A Match Made Indigenous: Celebrating 10 Incoming Native Resident-Physicians.
description: To honor their tireless dedication and journeys, we spoke with ten Indigenous medical students who recently matched into residency programs to learn more about what this moment means for them, their families, and communities.

title: COQUI : A Generative AI Speech Innovation Will Revolutionize This Market
description: Ex-Mozillians raise $3.3M for Coqui, generative AI speech synthesis for all creatives Coqui enables creatives to quickly and easily create, cast, and direct AI voice actors without all the hassle.

title: What Is The Best Cinema Format To See Shazam: Fury Of The Gods?
description: I’m a little late on this one as it’s already in cinemas but if you haven’t already seen it, or booked your tickets then you might be wondering what the best format is to see Shazam!

title: Sounding The Alarm: Firefighters Remain More Likely To Die By Suicide Than On Duty
description: Firefighting is a noble profession associated with heroism. But fighters and researchers are sounding the alarm on the mental and physical effects, warning it comes with severe costs that can lead to depression, burnout, anxiety, post-traumatic stress disorder, and suicidal ideation.

title: Elon Musk Makes Twitter Respond To All Questions From Reporters With Poop Emojis
description: If you’re a reporter reaching out to Twitter’s PR department, you’ll now be greeted with an automated response in the form of a poop emoji.

title: Silicon Valley Bank’s Demise Tightens Spigot On $30 Billion Of Venture Lending
description: Startups borrowed so they didn’t have to give up equity. After the collapse of market leader SVB, they should expect higher rates and fewer deals in the near future.

title: 68 Climate Leaders Changing The Film And TV Industry
description: Beyond the famous Hollywood faces of Extrapolations are a community of passionate creatives, researchers and activists, leading a sustainability transformation in TV and Radio. They are telling a new intersectional and hopeful climate story.

title: Eggshells—Not Bones—Reveal The Existence Of Previously Unknown Extinct Birds
description: A previously unknown species of elephant bird was recently discovered on the northeastern side of Madagascar and was identified solely from its ancient eggshells

title: In Cancer, Patient-Empowering AI Begins To Change Care, Relationships

title: ‘Shazam: Fury Of The Gods,’ Bad Reviews, Worse Box Office
description: The original Shazam was the third highest reviewed film in the DCEU with a 90%. The sequel, same star, same director, is a 53%, only above the original Suicide Squad, Batman V Superman, Justice League and Black Adam itself, which had a 39%.

title: Volkswagen Positive For 2023 Profits, But Doubts Build
description: VW's share price stormed ahead after it unveiled positive forecasts for profits in 2023 but later stalled after it revealed ambitious spending plans, and bottom-line implications for Europe turned ugly. Tesla’s price war is also shaking up the profitability outlook, with VW in the eye of the storm.

title: How Will ‘Destiny 2’ Honor Lance Reddick And Use Zavala Going Forward?
description: The Destiny community is still reeling from the loss of Lance Reddick, the actor who died this week at only age 60 after voicing Commander Zavala in the game for nearly a decade.
